about_the_game:
Descend into darkness in The Nights on Arcade, a chilling indie horror game available on Steam.

Axel's Paranormal Obsession

You are Axel Mirren Sommer, an adult obsessed with the paranormal, whose life has been marked by his fascination with the inexplicable. Ignoring the warnings of your little sister, you finally find employment in the mysterious Arcade World, a place that seems to have been forgotten by children for years.

The Search for Your Missing Sister

As you work through the bowels of this enigmatic arcade, your mind can't help but wonder where your sister, (Sttella Mirren Attaway), is. The last time you saw her was right here, in Arcade World.

Discover the Dark Secrets

In The Nights on Arcade, you will be plunged into a nightmare of supernatural horrors as you desperately search for answers about the disappearance of your sister and the dark secrets that envelop this abandoned place. As you explore the depths of Arcade World, you will face your worst fears and terrifying discoveries.

Courage in the Dark

Do you have the courage to reveal the horrors that lurk in the darkness? .- .-. . / -.-- --- ..- / ... ..- .-. . / - .... .- - / . ...- . .-. -.-- - .... .. -. --. / .. ... / .-. . .- .-.. ..--..? Get ready for a horror experience that will keep you in suspense all night long in Arcade World. Do you dare to face the night?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 510
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
